DOC.brief_summary: The investigator try determine therapeutic effect music glove conventional hand exercise program subacute stroke patient . All participant randomize two group : AB BA . They exercise least 3 time week 3 week minimal 3 hour exercise time per week . Participants receive intervention 3-month post stroke date . Clinical evaluation perform baseline , post therapy first intervention , 3-week post intervention follow , 3-month post stroke , post therapy second intervention , 3-week post second intervention follow , 6-month post stroke follow visit .
